an4.177:1.1: Atha kho ayasma rahulo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam rahulam bhagava etadavoca:
an4.177:2.1: “Ya ca, rahula, ajjhattika pathavidhatu ya ca bahira pathavidhatu, pathavidhaturevesa.
an4.177:2.2: ‘Tam netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti, evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
an4.177:2.3: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya disva pathavidhatuya nibbindati, pathavidhatuya cittam virajeti.
an4.177:3.1: Ya ca, rahula, ajjhattika apodhatu ya ca bahira apodhatu, apodhaturevesa.
an4.177:3.2: ‘Tam netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti, evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
an4.177:3.3: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya disva apodhatuya nibbindati, apodhatuya cittam virajeti.
an4.177:4.1: Ya ca, rahula, ajjhattika tejodhatu ya ca bahira tejodhatu, tejodhaturevesa.
an4.177:4.2: ‘Tam netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti, evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
an4.177:4.3: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya disva tejodhatuya nibbindati, tejodhatuya cittam virajeti.
an4.177:5.1: Ya ca, rahula, ajjhattika vayodhatu ya ca bahira vayodhatu, vayodhaturevesa.
an4.177:5.2: ‘Tam netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti, evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
an4.177:5.3: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya disva vayodhatuya nibbindati, vayodhatuya cittam virajeti.
an4.177:6.1: Yato kho, rahula, bhikkhu imasu catusu dhatusu nevattanam na attaniyam samanupassati, ayam vuccati, rahula, bhikkhu acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa”ti.
